name: DFASTAR Lexer Generator
short_description: DFASTAR reads regular-expression grammars and generates 4 types of lexical analyzers of different size and speed to satisfy the needs of your project:  1) small, 2) medium and 3) large table-driven lexers, and 4) direct-code lexers in C++.  Includes Microsoft Visual Studio projects.  Complete source code is supplied for compilation with GCC on Windows, Linux, Mac OS, etc.  Faster than "flex" and comparable to "re2c".
summary: Fast Lexical Analyzers in C++ [two times the speed of "flex"]
